sentences.en: Except in Finland, each program developed a special therapeutic milieu as an alternative to acute hospitalization.
sentences.cn: 除了在芬兰, 每个项目都发展了一种特别的治疗环境以作为急性住院治疗的备选方案.

sentences.en: His natural milieu is that of the arts.
It is only romantic reverie that cannot thrive in a milieu of sober criticism.
sentences.cn: 至于经不起严肃批评的东西,只是浪漫的遐想.

sentences.en: Proust’s work reflected his own social and cultural milieu.
sentences.cn: 普鲁斯特的作品反映了其所在的社会和文化背景。

sentences.en: She never felt happy in a student milieu.
sentences.cn: 在学生中间她从不觉得快乐。

sentences.en: The pop world is a milieu where reputations decline and fall with more than usual rapidity.
sentences.cn: 在流行音乐界这个娱乐圈里,歌星们的名望更容易一落千丈.

sentences.en: The Pop world is a milieu where reputations decline and fall with more than usual rapidity.
sentences.cn: 伊顿公学的联谊辩论俱乐部处境艰难,其声誉江河日下.

sentences.en: The toxicity was leukopenia, losing hair, milieu phlebitis.
sentences.cn: 不良反应主要为白细胞减少 、 发和周围静脉炎.

sentences.en: They stayed, safe and happy, within their own social milieu.
sentences.cn: 他们幸福无忧地呆在自己的社交圈子里。

sentences.en: Very Fine French Louis XV style gilt bronze mounted marquetry, rosewood and tulipwood table de milieu.
sentences.cn: 取得很好的法国路易十五风格的镀金青铜装镶嵌, 红木和郁金香木桌上的环境.

trans.tran_en: the things and people that surround you and influence the way you live and think
